post-root-package-install: [ -f artisan ] && php artisan key:generate --ansi || echo 'artisan file not found, skipping key generation'
post-install-cmd: [ -f artisan ] && php artisan migrate --force --ansi || echo 'artisan file not found, skipping migration'
post-update-cmd: [ -f artisan ] && php artisan migrate --force --ansi || echo 'artisan file not found, skipping migration'
